description:
Follow my step by step guide and turn your idea or hobby into a hands-free online income stream (without writing/recording a word, if you don’t want to!)

In this course you'll learn to:

  • Create your own high converting, digital product.
  • Use our surefire techniques to brainstorm profitable ideas.
  • Avoid wasting your precious time and energy on a potential failure, using this proven market research formula.
  • Use ethical ways to make you look like an ‘expert’, even if you’re not.
  • Employ this step by step method to finally getting your ebook written and published (part 5’s simplicity will surprise you)
  • Make your product look a million bucks, with tools that anyone can pick up and use to create stunning marketing graphics
  • Access the top selling marketplaces you can leverage, for instant traffic and sales
  • Use our guided method to creating a high value video course.
  • Have your videos looking like a pro even on the tightest of budgets.
  • Prepare your website so that it’s ready for sales
  • Write sales copy that sells with high click rates and happy affiliates
  • Protect your products using this step by step method
  • List your product in the JVZoo marketplace
  • Drive traffic that converts to leads and sales.
  • Create your own high converting, digital product.
  • Brainstorm successful niche market ideas if you haven’t found yours yet.
  • User our market research formula to lower the risk of choosing a ‘lemon’.
  • Look like an ‘expert’, even if you’re not and gain experience too!
  • Write an eBook using our step by step method.
  • Or follow our guide to avoid having to write (it’s cheaper than you think.)
  • Make your product look great using these design tricks
  • Create stunning marketing graphics using these secret software tools.
  • Find the right marketplaces you can leverage, for ongoing traffic and sales
  • How to structure a high value video course for higher percieved value.
  • Have your videos looking professional even on the tightest of budgets.
  • Prepare your website so that it’s ready for sales
  • Write sales copy that sells with high click rates and happy affiliates
  • Protect your products using this step by step method
  • List your product in the JVZoo marketplace
  • Drive traffic that converts to leads and sales.

Who is this course for?

This course has been created specifically for online entrepreneurs or people wishing to enter the online marketing space, turning an idea into a digital product that sells.

It will also be useful to people already with an online presence (website owners, bloggers, artists, coaches, public figures, or a business owners), who want to develop extra streams of income, as well as building brand recognition and furthering your expert status by releasing published works.

Throughout this course we will cover different methods and approaches to product creation, all of which are proven to work, allowing you to discover the best route for you personally, to achieve maximum success. Every part is tried and tested and will guide you so that you can:


...and much, much more!

Product creation has been my core business focus for almost 10 years, generating multiple 7 figures in product sales, with over 100,000 copies of various products sold.

It’s what truly gets me excited, finding that idea that will help people achieve their goals faster, easier and better – and being able to express my creativity in bringing it to the marketplace in a way that people will love (and want to buy).

The methods I share will help you harness your inner creativity, even if you don’t think you have any, and fire up a passion for financial growth through sharing what you know or, as I’ll share, what others know and are willing to pay to learn more about.

Within two hours you will know everything you need to know to market anything you choose, and be well on your way to being a published product creator!

I look forward to having you join us and connecting with you as we make our way through the course - so join up today and let's get started!

To your online success,
Cindy Battye & The Wildfire Concepts Team

P.S. If you are eager to get started it's super easy, just scroll to the top and click "Take this Course". See you soon!
title: Create & Sell A Digital Product: From Beginner To Expert
